title: Establishment of the Committee on AI Alignment and Ethics

reasoning.problem: Establishment of the Committee on AI Alignment and Ethics. This committee will review RLAIF research, align LEF's evolution with the Constitution, and serve as the 'Human Gate' preventing undesirable drift. I recommend Philosopher and Civics as initial members.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
